actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the possession or transfer of the easily concealable pistols known as "pocket rockets".

summary.text: Pocket Rocket Elimination Act of 2000 - Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to prohibit the possession or transfer of a handgun that is capable of holding two or more rounds of ammunition and that is less than seven and a half inches long. Makes this prohibition inapplicable to the possession or transfer of a handgun by: (1) a person who has had title to the handgun continuously since before the date of this Act's enactment; and (2) a law enforcement officer while acting as authorized in the line of duty. Sets penalties for violations.

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the possession or transfer of the easily concealable pistols known as "pocket rockets".
